source_parameters_file.comment: Path to file with event dereddened photometric parameters

blend_parameters_file.comment: Path to file with event dereddened photometric parameters

red_clump_parameters_file.comment: Path to file with event dereddened photometric parameters

target_field_id.comment: Field star ID of a specific star in the database or None

target_ra.comment: Right ascension of field centre or target in sexigesimal format, cannot be None

target_dec.comment: Declination of field centre or target in sexigesimal format, cannot be None

event_model_parameters_file.comment: Path to file with event model parameters

isochrone_file.comment: Path to the isochrone data file or None
